definition: to refer to one's foibles or failings with self-deprecating humor
to comfort oneself/to console oneself/to reassure oneself
(my, your) own person/(to assert) one's own personality

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒并决定减少压力和调整饮食，改变现状。

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。
他具有强烈的自我意识。

sentences.english: The positive self-concept will promote the individual mental health.
sentences.chinese: 积极的自我概念会促进个体的心理健康。

sentences.english: Make a self-development plan to acquire the skills and experiences you need.
sentences.chinese: 制定一个获取技能和经验的自我提升计划。

sentences.english: All participants were given a series of questions about the true self.
sentences.chinese: 所有参与者都要回答有关真实的自我的一系列问题。

sentences.english: And they should carry on the self-innovation constantly and pay attention to form the fund brand.
sentences.chinese: 并且要不断进行自我创新，注重打造基金品牌。

sentences.english: Independent, self-motivated, enthusiasm and well organized with analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 独立，自我激励，积极性和良好的分析能力，组织。

sentences.english: She spent hours admiring herself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 她用了几个小时对着镜子自我欣赏。

sentences.english: Jung's concept of the ego evolved over time.
sentences.chinese: 容格关于自我的概念是随着时间而发展。

sentences.english: Without you deny yourself, think about what other people live.
sentences.chinese: 不要自我否定，想想其他人是怎么过的。

sentences.english: Self-revelation is at the same time self-destruction.
sentences.chinese: 自我显露同时也是自我毁灭。

sentences.english: Self-revelation is at the same time self-destruction.
sentences.chinese: 自我显露同时也是自我毁灭。

sentences.english: The image of youth comes from the artist's self-reflection and expression of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 少年的形象是出于作者对自我情绪的反思和表达。

sentences.english: Globalization will not self-regulate in ways that ensure fair distribution of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 全球化不会自我调节，确保公平分配利益。

sentences.english: About gender and race differences in self-concept.
sentences.chinese: 自我概念上的性别差异和种族差异。

definition: human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
